name: Dozza
description:
Install instructions

Once you click download, go to Google Drive and click on "Shared with me." 

After that, click on the file Dozza_Game and click download. 

Once the game is downloaded, extract all the files.

After all the files have been extracted, double click on the Dozza_Game Exe to run the game.

If you come across "Window defender has protected your PC", click on more info and click run anyway.
